fields.name: When this space exists, anyone may buy a win for $10,000. The game will then end within 5 turns. If in that time:
fields.value: anyone else manages to buy a win, bankrupt everyone else, or win through some other means, they also get to win.

fields.name: Drive-By Effect:
fields.value: Whenever a player passes this space, the price decreases by $100.

fields.name: Stop-in Effect:
fields.value: Within the next five turns, you may select a player to sell Golden Potatoes to. Half their cash is divided amongst the other players. If you select a player richer than you, you are not one of the players the cash is divided amongst, you get nothing.
